vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
βουλ-ευτής, οῦ, ὁ,
councillor, senator, [Refs 8th c.BC+]; at Athens, one of the[Refs 5th c.BC+]; at Rome, senator, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__2 plotter, contriver, θανάτου, πληγῆς, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: member of a council (an advisory or legislative body) counsellor
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
member of a council (an advisory or legislative body) counsellor
a counsellor, senator; member of the Sanhedrin, Mk. 15:43; Lk. 23:50*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: miembro del concilio, de la junta suprema (del Sanedrín)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: thành viên của hội đồng ; nghị viên; một cố vấn
